divs: Sighting DetailsI was with my family in the pool, floating on my back looking in the sky. I saw a rather large circle,, much larger than a star, moving in a staight path. It was about 40 seconds, then I couldn't see it due to trees blocking the view. It was a circle, white and looked just like a cloud, only it was a circle and it moved, and the circle shape never changed. It was not a cloud, it looked different than a cloud, it was cloud like. It moved straight like an object. Latter a plane flew over, it was a larger white plane, which I thought was odd, because all we see is small aircraft, or passenger jets.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Goshen
There were no other sightings in Goshen on or around July 30th 2011
